paths

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • paths.Path
      • paths.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, Drawable

    public class Shape
extends Path
    A sequence of vertices attached by lines, analogous to using Processing's beginShape(), vertex(), and endShape() functions.
    Author:
    James Morrow [jamesmorrowdesign.com]

      • trace

        public void trace(Point pt,
                  float u)
        Description copied from class: Path
        Given a 1D coordinate, a float, maps the coordinate to a 2D coordinate and stores it in a given Point.

        Maps a given floating point number within [0, 1) to a given Point along the perimeter of the Path.
        Specified by:
        trace in class Path
        Parameters:
        pt - The Point in which the result is stored.
        u - A number within [0, 1)

      • blend

        public static Shape blend(Path a,
                          Path b,
                          float amt,
                          int sampleCount)
        Blends two Paths and makes a Shape.
        Parameters:
        a - The first Path
        b - The second Path
        amt - A value from 0 to 1, determining how much to weight Path b over Path a.
        sampleCount - The number of sample points to use
        Returns:
        The Shape
